13:18 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
13:55 <jvelo> Hello friends  
13:55 <jvelo> Does anyone knows a way to skip building installers when building XE ?  
14:02 <vmassol> jvelo: I think I need to add again the profile for that….  
14:02 <vmassol> I had removed it after a discussion with thomas  
14:03 <vmassol> right now what you can do is just list the projects to build  
14:03 <vmassol> \*modules  
14:03 <jvelo> yes the debian installer takes quite some time.  
14:03 <vmassol> mvn -pl  
14:03 <vmassol> or better  
14:03 <vmassol> pick the module you want to build  
14:03 <vmassol> and use mvn -amd  
14:04 <vmassol> for example if you want to build hsqldb/jetty  
14:05 <vmassol> it's -am actually  
14:06 <vmassol> mvn -am -pl xwiki-enterprise-distribution/xwiki-enterprise-jetty/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb/  
14:06 <vmassol> or  
14:06 <jvelo> nice  
14:07 <vmassol> mvn -am -pl org.xwiki.enterprise:xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb  
14:07 <vmassol> the two will do the same thing  
14:07 <jvelo> pl = project list ?  
14:14 <sdumitriu> From myxwiki logs: Couldn't find mysql binary  
14:14 <vmassol> jvelo: yep  
14:15 <vmassol> sdumitriu: are you subscribed to the infra list?  
14:15 <vmassol> [[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
14:15 <vmassol> node2 is trying to restart… has tried 4 times already  
14:15 <sdumitriu> I think so, I get myxwiki crash reports  
14:15 <vmassol> ok then you are  
14:16 <vmassol> the "Couldn't find mysql binary" is not the issue IMO  
14:16 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
14:16 <vmassol> if you check the logs below it seems it can access mysql  
14:16 <vmassol> it's just the reporting tool that cannot find the mysql lib  
14:17 <sdumitriu> Yes, figured that out  
14:17 <sdumitriu> It's connecting to a remote host  
14:18 <jvelo> com.ning.http.client.providers.netty.NettyAsyncHttpProvider keeps logging forever on my local build, is that a known issue ?  
14:19 <sdumitriu> Doesn't happen for me  
14:24 <jvelo> strange. The log says this : INFO: Number of application's worked threads is 8  
14:26 <vmassol> btw guys  
14:26 <vmassol> l10n has restarted too overnight  
14:27 <vmassol> interestingly all the threads were blocked on this:  
14:27 <vmassol> java.lang.Thread.State: BLOCKED (on object monitor)  
14:27 <vmassol>     at com.xpn.xwiki.XWiki.getXWiki(XWiki.java:493)  
14:27 <vmassol> if you look at the code indeed we have:  
14:27 <vmassol>                 synchronized (XWiki.class) {  
14:27 <vmassol> so if the first thread to go in blocks, then all threads coming in will block too till the first one finishes  
14:48 <sdumitriu> Fixed myxwiki, I had to increase the pool size  
14:48 <vmassol> weird  
15:12 <vmassol> guys, just sent a mail about mockito in case you're interested  
15:13 <vmassol> hope you agree with it, if not I'll revert  
15:43 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki
